The Shadchan is coming in a few minutes, and you look a wreck!
Don't take this the wrong way, sweetheart,
all of you! Stop touching my things!
Please tell me this is not happening!
I'm afraid not only is this happening, dear
but it's happening in five minutes.
It was the only appointment we were able to get
but with Yafa's magic hands you'll be ready in two…
Look at you! Get up! Get dressed! Come on!
I am not seeing ANYONE tonight!
just go home, and leave me alone!
